metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10161 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered that libvirtd before versions 4.10.1 and 5.4.1 would permit read-only clients to use the virDomainSaveImageGetXMLDesc() API, specifying an arbitrary path which would be accessed with the permissions of the libvirtd process. An attacker with access to the libvirtd socket could use this to probe the existence of arbitrary files, cause denial of service or cause libvirtd to execute arbitrary programs.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
